meta.name: description
meta.content: The e-texts of the SARIT project. Contribute to sarit/SARIT-corpus development by creating an account on GitHub.

div.class: Box-body p-0 blob-wrapper data type-xml

tr.td: <authority>SARIT: Search and Retrieval of Indic Texts</authority>
<item>to Share — to copy, distribute and transmit the work</item>
<item>Attribution — You must attribute the work in the manner
specified by the author or licensor (but not in any way that
suggests that they endorse you or your use of the work).</item>
<item>Share Alike — If you alter, transform, or build upon this
work, you may distribute the resulting work only under the same
or similar license to this one.</item>
More information and fuller details of this license are given on the
<bibl><title>The Prasastapadabhasya with Commentary Nyayakandali of Sridhara</title>
<note>Sri Garbi Dass Oriental Ser., 13. Reprint of the edition Benares 1895,
Compounds are not analyzed into constituent words.
Page/line number of the edition are tagged in brackets; e.g., "(48.7)" = p. 48, line
<item>Tweaked the TEI header to reflect current SARIT usage.</item>
